title: Kyouryuu Shoujo Gauko 2nd Season
alternative_title: Dino Girl Gauko Season 2, 恐竜少女ガウ子シーズン2
description: The comedy series is set in Japan and follows Naoko Watanabe, a typical tween girl aside from the fact that she possesses strange and sometimes troubling powers. When her anger exceeds a maximum level, she turns into Gauko, the fire-breathing dinosaur girl.
